name: Tank Wars
summary: Tanks are the most popular units in the gaming world, and many won't argue with that. So the appearance of new Tank Wars game will undoubtedly cause a lot of people's joy. The plot of the game is not original - the defense of the headquarters. You can play alone, repulsive attacks endless line of enemy tanks, or two, trying to beat his friend in a tank duel. Before you plunge into battle, develop a strategy. Act deliberately to gain victory. Shoot your cannon into the brick walls, but leave something for cover, sometimes it's good to wait or ambush. The vertical panels on the left and right show information about the number of remaining enemies and lives.
